FAQ.trending-desc: Every week, we present the most searched and discussed questions by users. This week's trending questions cover interesting topics such as the latest technology innovations, productivity tips, and health trends. Explore answers from experts and gain valuable insights to enhance your knowledge.
FAQ.freq-desc: We often receive questions from clients about various important topics. The most frequently asked questions include how to use our services, the shipping process, and return policies. We always strive to provide clear and informative answers to help clients better understand our services.

AboutSection.description: We are here to turn your dream home into reality. With over 10 years of experience, we are the leading solution for the best home design.

1.title: HOME DESIGN CONSULTATION
1.description: Create your dream home with our team of experts. Get personalized design solutions that fit your needs and lifestyle.

2.title: 3D & 2D INTERIOR ROOM DESIGN
2.description: Visualize your dream home with detailed and realistic 3D & 2D designs. Experience the feeling of exploring your home before it's built.

3.title: CUSTOM INTERIOR FURNITURE
3.description: Complete your home with high-quality custom furniture designed specifically to maximize the function and aesthetics of your space.

1.title: DESIGN CONSULTATION WITH CLIENTS
1.description: We begin by understanding your needs and design vision through in-depth consultation.

2.title: CREATION OF HOME DESIGN PROTOTYPE
2.description: We develop an initial design prototype based on the consultation results, providing a visual representation of your home concept.

3.title: HOME DESIGN DEVELOPMENT
3.description: The design prototype is refined with more specific details, ensuring the final design meets your expectations and needs.

PortofolioSection.title: Your Satisfaction Is Our Priority
PortofolioSection.subtitle: Our Portfolio
PortofolioSection.description: We are committed to providing the best service and satisfactory results. We work on every project wholeheartedly, because your happiness is our pride.

CTAHomePage.title: Make Your Home More Meaningful With Us
CTAHomePage.subtitle: Contact us now for a free consultation and make your dream home a reality with UNION CREATIVE DESIGN.

AboutPage.pageSubtitle: We are a creative agency that focuses on delivering the best digital solutions for our clients.
AboutPage.sectionDescription: We are here to turn your dream home into reality. With over 10 years of experience, we are the leading solution for the best home design.
AboutPage.visionText: To be the leading provider of home solutions that deliver meaningful, functional, and aesthetic designs.

missionItems.1: Providing comprehensive and high-quality one-stop smart living solutions.
missionItems.2: Creating unique, personal homes that reflect the owner's personality.
missionItems.3: Utilizing the latest technology and quality materials for the best results.
missionItems.4: Building long-term relationships with clients based on trust and satisfaction.

timProfesional.title: Professional Team
timProfesional.description: Supported by a team of experienced and dedicated architects, interior designers, construction experts, and decorators.

teknologiCanggih.title: Advanced Technology
teknologiCanggih.description: Utilizing high-tech machinery to produce high-quality products.

workshopTerpadu.title: Integrated Workshop
workshopTerpadu.description: We have an integrated office and workshop facility in West Bandung for efficiency and production quality.

portofolioKuat.title: Strong Portfolio
portofolioKuat.description: We have completed various residential projects with satisfactory results.

OurTeam.title: Our Team
OurTeam.subtitle: We are a team of professionals dedicated to providing the best service to our clients.

CTAWhatsApp.quote: "WORK HARD & GREAT QUALITY IS OUR PRIORITY"
